title: Diagnose executor metadata loss/mismatch as a strict-profile hop-lowering guard
feature: executor hop lowering metadata loss guard

diagnostics.message: compiled module metadata does not match emitted textual interface

mode_matrix.name: debug-o0
abi_requirements: executor-affinity metadata is required input to call-site hop lowering decisions
strict import/verification rejects missing or mismatched objc_executor metadata instead of assuming no-hop
cross-executor entry remains classified as potentially suspending when proof metadata is unavailable

mode_matrix.name: optimized-o2
abi_requirements: optimization preserves strict-profile metadata validation outcomes for executor-affinity fields
optimized hop lowering does not treat metadata loss as proof of same-executor execution
executor-affinity mismatch remains diagnosable under interface verification in optimized builds

abi_field_stability.stability_property: importers keep executor metadata as required semantic input for hop insertion and await enforcement
